pages.text: Unlike your other gemstones, [#](bb00bb)Amethyst[#]() seems to have the ability to power spell casting wands. While this ability has broken your brain more than once, the results are impressive.\What more is there?

pages.title: Edified Leaves Crushing
pages.text: Hexcasters are seemingly unable to identify minerals other than Amethyst. _Clearly_ these cyan-colored leaves have the essence of [#](bb00bb)Topaz[#]()...

pages.title: Edified Leaves Crafting
pages.text: By infusing [#](bb00bb)Leaves[#]() with [#](bb00bb)Amethyst[#](), [#](bb00bb)Citrine[#]() or [#](bb00bb)Topaz[#](), you get out glistening, colorful [#](bb00bb)Gemstone Leaves[#](), from your [Colored Trees](book://general/colored_trees). Intriguingly different, yet familiar.

pages.title: Charging Amethyst
pages.text: You can charge up [#](bb00bb)Amethyst Shards[#]() using the [Fusion Shrine](book://general/fusion_shrine).

pages.title: New Potion Reagent
pages.text: - +15-120s duration. Sometimes more, sometimes less\\As you expected, [#](bb00bb)Charged Amethyst[#]() serves as a more potent, but also more fluctuate, [#](bb00bb)Amethyst[#]() reagent in regards to prolonging durations.
